newsitem.title: GERMANY: German kills former wife in courtroom shooting.
newsitem.headline: German kills former wife in courtroom shooting.

text.p: A German man shot dead his former wife and seriously wounded her female lawyer when he opened fire in a Frankfurt law court on Friday, police said.
A police spokesman said the man pulled out a gun and shot the two women and then surrendered to police.
"It was a case about alimony payments," spokesman Peter Borchardt told a crowd of reporters outside the civil court building in Frankfurt's legal district.

The lawyer was taken to hospital with serious injuries. The spokesman did not give names or ages of the people involved and declined to give further details. He said a press conference would be held later.
